scripts.validate-xrefs: for LNG in de en fr it ru pt es; do cd $LNG; $(npm bin)/antora --generator @antora/xref-validator ./antora-playbook.yml; cd ..; done
scripts.translate: po4a po4a.conf; for LNG in en fr it ru pt es; do cp -nrT de/modules/ROOT/assets/ $LNG/modules/ROOT/assets; cp -nrT de/modules/ROOT/partials/ $LNG/modules/ROOT/partials; done
scripts.build: for LNG in de en fr it ru pt es; do cd $LNG; $(npm bin)/antora generate antora-playbook.yml --to-dir ../build/$LNG || exit; cd ..; done; cp index.html build/
